an1.31-40:31.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ adantaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1.31-40:31.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, adantaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1.31-40:32.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ dantaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1.31-40:32.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, dantaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1.31-40:33.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ aguttaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1.31-40:33.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, aguttaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1.31-40:34.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ guttaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1.31-40:34.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, guttaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1.31-40:35.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ arakkhitaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1.31-40:35.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, arakkhitaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1.31-40:36.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ rakkhitaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1.31-40:36.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, rakkhitaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1.31-40:37.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ asaṃvutaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1.31-40:37.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, asaṃvutaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1.31-40:38.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ saṃvutaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1.31-40:38.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, saṃvutaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1.31-40:39.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ adantaṃ aguttaṃ arakkhitaṃ asaṃvutaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1.31-40:39.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, adantaṃ aguttaṃ arakkhitaṃ asaṃvutaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
an1.31-40:40.1.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ rakkhitaṃ saṃvutaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1.31-40:40.1.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, dantaṃ guttaṃ rakkhitaṃ saṃvutaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
